short_summary: OPERATION OF DUCK BANDING STATION AT PARENT LAKE (48° 39' 8" N, 77° 3' 49" W) FOR SUMMER PERIOD.
description: The objective is to operate the duck banding station at Parent Lake. The results obtained in a final report will contribute to the cooperative duck banding program. The contractor will be required to perform the following tasks:...
full_summary:
======================================

### Tender Title

ACAN - Duck Banding at Lac Parent Station

### Solicitation Number

5000081508

### Contracting Agency

Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC)

### Tender Description

ECCC requires a contractor to operate the duck banding station at Parent Lake (48° 39' 8" N, 77° 3' 49" W) for the summer periods of 2024, 2025, and 2026. The contractor will be responsible for operating the station, capturing and banding ducks, and conducting a daily data compilation. The contractor must also prepare a final report at the end of each summer season.

### Key Tasks

*   Work preparation and site visit
*   Construction and/or repair of cages
*   Pre-baiting and installation of large cages
*   Capture and banding of ducks
*   Daily data compilation
*   Production of an activity report
*   Shipment of material to the Canadian Wildlife Service
*   Compliance with task risk analysis: Waterfowl Banding Risk

### Contractual Requirements

*   All work and deliverables must be in French.
*   The contractor will not be reimbursed for actual authorized travel and living expenses reasonably incurred in the performance of the work.
*   The contractor must house and feed the resource at the work site for the duration of the contract.

### Tender Documents

*   The tender notice and related documents can be accessed on the Government of Canada's Tenders and Procurement website at [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/).
*   The tender notice can be viewed in English or French.

### Contact Information

*   Kassandra Lauzier
*   Contact Email: [kassandra.lauzier@ec.gc.ca](mailto:kassandra.lauzier@ec.gc.ca)
*   Contact Phone: (438) 801-0827
*   Contact Address: 105 McGill Street, 5th Floor, Montreal, Quebec H2Y 2E7, Canada

### Tender Closing Date and Time

*   June 21, 2024, 15:00:00 hours

### Contract Award Notice

*   ECCC intends to award a contract for the services outlined in this tender notice.  For information only, the notice is as follows:

---

This is the Advance Contract Award Notice for the above-mentioned tender.
